practice_phrases: Of course you can see her friend.
当然你可以见她的朋友。
Of course I'm happy you're doing well.
当然我很高兴你做得好。
Of course you can ask her because she knows.
当然你可以问她因为她知道。
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
当然你可以问她因为她是我的朋友。
Of course you can ask her about that.
当然你可以问她关于那个。
You can ask her because she knows very well.
你可以问她因为她知道得很好。
I think you can ask her if you want to know.
我认为如果你想知道你可以问她。
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
当然你可以问她因为她是我的朋友。
You can ask her because she's very important.
你可以问她因为她非常重要。
That was a surprise because she's my friend too.
那是个惊喜因为她也是我的朋友。
Of course you can ask her because she's my friend.
当然你可以问她因为她是我的朋友。
I think it's good because she's my friend and she knows.
我认为它好因为她是我的朋友而且她知道。

她是我的朋友而且我很了解她。
